/name,sage /face,mechanic Die, monster! You don't belong in this world!
	/name,parsley /face,fluffy It was not by my hand that I'm once again given flesh. I was called here by humans who wish to pay me tribute.
	/name,sage /face,mechanic 'Tribute'?! You steal men's souls, and make them your slaves!
	/name,parsley /face,fluffy Perhaps the same could be said of all religions.
	/name,sage /face,mechanic Your words are as empty as your soul! Mankind ill needs a savior such as you!
	/name,parsley /face,fluffy What is a man? [flings his wine glass aside] A miserable little pile of secrets! But enough talk! Have at you!
